creator: thomas.wiesel@zuv.uni-bamberg.de
text:
The archive apache-tomcat-6.0.13.zip contains the old catalina.policy file from
tomcat 5

The policy file is correct. The version shoudl have been changed when the TC5
files were copied to create TC6. This was fixed for 6.0.14 onwards.
creator: markt@apache.org
